common_issues.title: Audio Not Working During Interview
common_issues.solution:
1. Check your microphone permissions in browser settings
2. Ensure your microphone is properly connected
3. Test your microphone in browser settings
4. Try refreshing the page
5. Clear browser cache and cookies

common_issues.title: Interview Session Disconnected
common_issues.solution:
1. Check your internet connection
2. Close other bandwidth-heavy applications
3. Try using a different browser
4. Clear browser cache
5. Contact support if issue persists

common_issues.title: Payment Failed
common_issues.solution:
1. Verify your card details
2. Ensure sufficient funds
3. Check if card is expired
4. Contact your bank
5. Try a different payment method

quick_tips.title: Prepare Your Space
quick_tips.description: Find a quiet room with good lighting and minimal background noise for the best interview experience.

quick_tips.title: Test Your Equipment
quick_tips.description: Always test your microphone and speakers before starting an interview session.

quick_tips.title: Review Your Resume
quick_tips.description: Keep your resume handy and review it before the interview for better context-aware responses.

getting_started.question: How do I start my first interview?
getting_started.answer:
1. Upload your resume
2. Select your target position
3. Choose interview type
4. Configure preferences
5. Click 'Start Interview'

getting_started.question: What subscription plans are available?
getting_started.answer:
We offer three plans:
- Free: 1 interview/month
- Basic: 5 interviews/month
- Premium: Unlimited interviews

technical_support.question: What are the system requirements?
technical_support.answer:
- Modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)
- Stable internet connection
- Microphone access
- Minimum 2MB/s internet speed

technical_support.question: How do I update my browser settings?
technical_support.answer:
1. Open browser settings
2. Go to Privacy & Security
3. Allow microphone access
4. Enable cookies for our domain

billing.question: How do I update my payment method?
billing.answer:
1. Go to Account Settings
2. Select 'Billing'
3. Click 'Update Payment Method'
4. Enter new card details
5. Save changes

common_solutions.no_sound: Check system volume and browser permissions
common_solutions.echo: Use headphones or reduce speaker volume
